RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf

RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf Class Reference

#include <xmlserverconf.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Server::xmlServerConf:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class used to save the server configuration.

The constructor simply try to load the xmlfile. You must then call save(ServerConfiguration*) or load(ServerConfiguration*) according to the usage.

Definition at line 41 of file xmlserverconf.h.
